name: friday-freebie-french-fries
title: Friday Freebie: French Fries
author: Morgan Levy
contentEncoded:
If your idea of a fun time is entering Opry Mills Mall between 5pm-8pm tonight, you deserve a reward. Visit the food court for a free small fry from the Great Steak & Potato Co. for the last of the week’s Make-A-Wish freebies. Good luck to ya.
